text: Nassim Hnid (born 12 March 1997) is a Tunisian professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Greek club AEK Athens and the Tunisia national team. ==Career== On 20 August 2020, Hnid joined Super League Greece club AEK Athens. AEK Athens reportedly paid a transfer fee of €600,000 to CS Sfaxien while Hnid signed a four-year contract. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- |colspan="3"|Tunisia national team |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2019||2||0 |- !Total||2||0 |} ==References== Category:Living people Category:1997 births Category:People from Zarzis Category:Association football central defenders Category:Tunisian footballers Category:Tunisia international footballers Category:Tunisian Ligue Professionnelle 1 players Category:CS Sfaxien players Category:AEK Athens F.C. players Category:Tunisian expatriate footballers Category:Tunisian expatriate sportspeople in Greece Category:Expatriate footballers in Greece Category:2019 Africa Cup of Nations players
title: Nassim Hnid
